title: Water Plants
creator: Block Puzzle Challenge Cool Fun Interactive Games

extendedInfo.description: Remind you to water your plantsYou can take notes, specify the alarm time, disable/enable the alarm, and more.This app can handle large amount of plants.Plants are listed in a sortable list for easy management.If you do not want it to remind you so often, you can stop the water notification for up to 99999 minutes once you open this app or refresh the plant list.You can view plants with recent alarms and upcoming alarms in a time range from -99999 minutes to +99999 minutes.Tags: water plants, garden, flower, remind, notification
